title_short: (7050-225) Montemor-o-Novo - 9A Rua de São Tiago do Castelo
description: Small peaceful location high up in the village, we spent a very quiet night, no passage. Very nice on the edge of the rampart with public toilets nearby. Toilets closed at night unfortunately (I don't have the timetables) but open the next day at 9:30 am, very clean.

address.street: 9A Rua de São Tiago do Castelo

title: (7050-167) Montemor-o-Novo - 74 Avenida Gago Coutinho

title: (7050-217) Montemor-o-Novo - 41 Rua da Janelinha

title: (7050) Montemor-o-Novo - Unnamed Road
description: Earthen parking lot near an artificial lake. Shade, a place frequented by fishermen. Does not seem accessible to motorhomes but there is a parking area for 2 or 3 just before this place.

title: (7000) São Sebastião da Giesteira - Unnamed Road
title_short: (7000) São Sebastião da Giesteira - Unnamed Road
description: We stopped in the parking lot because the other spots were taken. No prohibition signs, non-functional lamp post on part of the car park. 2 passages of vehicles that parked near us where passed until midnight but the rest of the night no passage

title: (7050) - Unnamed Road
description: OK for a night. The first part of the track by the dam is a little rough, but at least you need to travel all the way down to the other mark on here. Very quite night completely on our own

title: (7050) - Unnamed Road
description: At the edge of a lake, along the dam, very quiet, occupied by a few fishermen and some clinking of cow bells. Otherwise silence. Try to arrive before 8:15 pm, sunset. Superb.

title: (7050) Montemor-o-Novo - Unnamed Road
description: Lovely quiet place on the water in the middle of nature. For access just before the “bridge” follow the sandy path to the left.

title: (7050-349) Santa Sofia - A6
description: Area with a table in the shade of a century-old tree at the foot of the road. Passing cars don't see you and it's fine. Surroundings a bit dirty but we stopped to eat and take a nap and enjoyed it.

title: (7000) São Sebastião da Giesteira - A6
description: Gas station with very clean toilets and shower.

title: (7050) Alcalva - N114
description: Fountain at a rest area. Locals also fetch water here

title: (7040) - N4
description: Parking on old road, perfect for lunch and can be sleep.

name: O Parque dos Leitões
title: (7040) O Parque dos Leitões
description: Good for resting for a few hours (Toilets, black and gray water drains, plenty of free water) Everything is very clean.

title: (7050) Ciborro - Largo do Povo
description: Small public parking, leveled and illuminated, on upper top of “Largo do Povo” square in CIBORRO village, 50m away from road EN 2. Parking free on evening and night, usually, enough for 2 or 3 motorhomes. Quiet during night. It lies 100m away from iconic km 500 of tourist road track EN 2 and associated bar/restaurant. There is also fuel station on the road and small dam (= “barragem”). Dam is 1,5 km away by good gravel road; nice to a very quiet night and stars watching. Public toilets, clean, 250m to S (in small blue&white garden).

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Parking site Cromeleques de Almendres. Free parking, menhirs nearby, dirt road to access but drivable. Arrived at night preferably, surrounding cork oak forest.

title: (7000) Vale Maria -
description: Place at a megalithic tomb. Very quiet.

title: () Nossa Senhora de Guadalupe - 19 Rua do Posto Médico
title_short: () Nossa Senhora de Guadalupe - 19 Rua do Posto Médico
description: Located at the beginning of the track that leads to Cromlech dos Almendres. Quiet place to spend the night. There is another parking lot a few meters from the cromlech, 3/4 Km drivable, bumpy but accessible to circulating slowly

title: (7000-222) Nossa Senhora de Guadalupe - 1 Beco das Lavadeiras
title_short: (7000-222) Nossa Senhora de Guadalupe - 1 Beco das Lavadeiras
description: Public toilets including showers, in the town of Guadalupe. Not far from the track to the menhirs and the "interpretation station" Open this February, I don't know if it was open in winter

title: (7050) São Cristóvão - 38.490760, -8.315793
description:
Countryside small farm, family friendly and very cosy. Safe and quiet.
The owners are young farmers who are also campers. 
Drinkable water is available. Wastewater and black water drainage available. 
4G internet coverage
The farm is very close to the picturesque village of São Cristóvão where you can take advantage of the local gastronomy, secular church and hiking grounds.
Situated halfway between Montemor o Novo and Alcácer do Sal taking the road N253.

title: (7040) Arraiolos - N251
description: Well, good for filling canisters or bottles, or a tank with a watering can. Parking in the bay opposite.

title: (7080) Vendas Novas - Unnamed Road
description: Parking area next to a school and a sports center. Very calm.

title: (7080-075) Vendas Novas - 35 Rua Sarmento Vieira
description: Very nice laundry. Parking in front.

title: (7080) Vendas Novas -
description: Large municipal parking. located near sports complex and schools. you can park along the road or drive on to a large flat lawn with cork oaks. had a quiet night. in Vendas Novas there are several department stores.

title: (7000) Évora - N114
description: Picknick place by the road under a big  tree

title: (7040) Arraiolos - 60 Rua do Bairro Serpa Pinto
title_short: (7040) Arraiolos - 60 Rua do Bairro Serpa Pinto
description: Intermarket parking with free water tap. Fuel, tire inflation and laundromat. Covered and narrow parking, ok for vans. Small vehicle only

title: (7040) Arraiolos - Rua 5 de Outubro

title: (7040-010) Arraiolos - 63 Rua Doutor Luís Silveiro
description: Parked here to visit Arraiolos. Space ok. Do not enter inside village with regular motorhome, small streets!

title: (7000) - 3 Rua General Humberto Delgado
description: A small plot of land just off the road next to the river. There is a picnic bench and the small town with a bar is a few minutes walk. Very quiet at night. No facilities or services but a nice place to stay and have a good sleep

title: (7040) Arraiolos - Rua do Castelo
description: Parking in the castle. rather unusual places to spend a night. accessible to any type of motorhome.

title: () Nossa Sra. de Guadalupe - Unnamed Road
title_short: () Nossa Sra. de Guadalupe - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of the big Zambujeiro Dolmen. Just drive track to get there, but after great tranquility for peaceful nights ...

title: (7040-040) Arraiolos - 3 Travessa dos Moleiros
description: Follow parking three a good descent to get to this sloping dirt parking lot but close to the main square and the museum we stayed there for one night.

title: (7040) Arraiolos - 20 Rua do Cabo da Vila
title_short: (7040) Arraiolos - 20 Rua do Cabo da Vila
description: Ideal place for people in Vannes! for motorhomes it seems a little fair, but we find ourselves in the wilderness by being next to the city! Downhill we find a platform we can park the minivans in the back !! Ideal for one night !!

title: (7000) Nossa Senhora da Tourega - Unnamed Road
title_short: (7000) Nossa Senhora da Tourega - Unnamed Road
description:
Very good place to spend the night, calm, good shadows, well covered,
Always leave it clean.

thank you

title: (7000) Nossa Senhora de Guadalupe -
description: Vineyard where 1 fully self-sufficient camper/mobile home can be parked for a maximum of 24 hours. You pay for a product and can then camp for free next to the vineyard.

title: (7000) - Unnamed Road
description: Ruins of an ancient Roman bath. Drinking water taps at the cemetery Unpaved road but also mobile with a mobile home

title: (7040) Arraiolos -
description: Abandoned train station, now an ecopist with picnic area, flat area with some shade from pine trees, noise in background from main road but very quiet at night. Great for a walk along the old railway line.

title: (7040) Igrejinha - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place tree accessible with any vehicle, all sizes

title: (7040) Igrejinha - CM1155
description: Very quiet place in the middle of nature, with a magnificent view of an artificial lake, inhabited by large fish, sheep, cows and flamingos! We were able to take a bike ride and saw a few swimmers. Pay attention to the ground clearance and the condition of the track in the event of rain for motorhomes. Access by going around the lake or near the farm by a small barrier. Provide a mosquito repellent for the evening and a garbage bag: it is the only place around the lake that is not littered with plastics, it would be good if it remained!

title: (7580) Alcácer do Sal - Unnamed Road
description: Great place. Free camping. Views

title: (7580) - Rua Primeiro de Maio
description:
Espaço muito tranquilo, pode pernoitar à beira de água, aos fins-de-semana com mais movimento com desportos náuticos, ideal para relax e muito espaço para picnic. Óptimo para as crianças brincarem e andar de bicicleta.
Very quiet space, you can spend the night at the water's edge, on weekends with more movement with water sports, ideal for relaxing and plenty of space for picnics. Great for kids to play and ride a bike.

title: (7040) Igrejinha - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place on the edge of a lake and under the pines. Access by a narrow, recently paved road. 1200 m of possible access with a 7 m motorhome. Very pleasant quiet stopover in a very pretty environment.

title: (7000-409) Évora - 1 Rua Alberto Caeiro
description: Ideal parking to go to the swimming pool even with a motorhome of more than 7 meters

title: (7580) Santa Susana (Aldeia de Santa Susana) - 26 Rua Primeiro de Maio
title_short: (7580) Santa Susana (Aldeia de Santa Susana) - 26 Rua Primeiro de Maio
description: Village of Santa Susana, access road to the Pego do Altar dam, very quiet area ideal for picnics, with tables, barbecue and water, ideal for having a meal and putting on water. Small parking space.

title: (7580) Alcácer do Sal - Rua Primeiro de Maio
title_short: (7580) Alcácer do Sal - Rua Primeiro de Maio
description: At the edge of a lake, very large, lots of space. Dirty enough in places do not hesitate to pick up trash!

title: (7040) Igrejinha - Unnamed Road
description:
Parking in front of the dam surrounded by nature and very calm and beautiful and clean. Take the trash with you.
Parking only for the day.

title: (7580) Santa Susana - Unnamed Road
description: Very pretty spot, calm and peaceful on the edge of a magnificent pond. You can park anywhere with any type of vehicle. Very easy to access. Trash cans are present at the entrance. Possibility of carrying out several cycling, fishing, swimming and hiking activities as long as you are equipped. Relatively clean, although there is some trash present. Damage. We had a good night there!

title_short: (7580) Santa Susana (Aldeia de Santa Susana) - 1 Travessa Catarina Eufémia

title: (7580) Santa Susana - Unnamed Road
description:
Beautiful, peaceful resovior.
only rubbish facilities

title: (7580) - Unnamed Road
description: Nice and private area, a bit hidden and away from the other more popular spots at the lake. can be reached via a dirt road through the forest with 2 steep parts. arrival during daylight recommended. 4wd or small campervan (Mercedes Vito/ VW T5 etc) is possible.

name: Camping Orbitur

Agua de Parata laundry facilities.

Fast WiFi, pay by cash using machine that gives change.

title: (7005) Évora - 65A Avenida Túlio Espanca

name: Parque de Autocaravanas Évora
title: (7005-206) Parque de Autocaravanas Évora

title: (7005-401) Évora - 42 Rua Joaquim da Silva Nazareth
title_short: (7005-401) Évora - 42 Rua Joaquim da Silva Nazareth
description: It's a dead end. Calm. With trees. Next to Fiat assistance.

title: (7005-410) Évora - 11 Rua de Viana
description:
Our Self Service Laundry is located at Rua de Viana, 11, 7005-410 in Évora.
 Here you can wash and dry your clothes, wait in comfort, always with our quality guarantee.
 We are open 365 days a year from 7 am to 10 pm.

title: (7005-158) Évora - 1R Rua Gil Vicente
description: Public toilets. Very clean. Papers available.

title: (7005-206) Évora - 3 Praceta Nicolau Chanterene
description: Non-potable water. Low flow public fountain tap. To fill small cars discreetly for free

title: (7005-212) Évora - 5 Rua Geraldo Fernando Pinto
description: Good place to wash and clean the motorhome

title: (7005-469) Évora - 12 Rua Doutor António Bartolomeu Gromicho
title_short: (7005-469) Évora - 12 Rua Doutor António Bartolomeu Gromicho
description: Parking close to town.

name: Parking Descampado
title: (7005-140) Parking Descampado
description:
Very big and close to town. Noisy from 8am. Cars keep driving by.
Parking for all types of vehicles. 100 meters away, there is a park for children.
Closed during the market!

title: (7005) Évora - 10 Rua de São Brás
description: Dirt parking in town, seems to be no restrictions. Space for a few vehicles and seems to be some motorhomes

title: (7005) Évora - Rua da Quinta da Alcântara
title_short: (7005) Évora - Rua da Quinta da Alcântara
description: Washing machine and dryer. Only in the operating time of the store

title: (7005) Évora - Circular de Évora
description: Nice and calm place to park for a night, has gas station on site, some clothes stores and a supermarket with a good selection of products & competitive prices.  Now with as new shopping center nearby (1.5km max distance).  The gray and black water disposal installed, potable water available, for wc use ask supermarket staff. Opportunity to visit Evora , bus stop nearby.

title: (7000) Évora - 16 Rua de Eborim
description: Day and night parking, next to the historic center of Évora; five minutes from the Cathedral. Possibility of shaded places in the early hours of the morning. Quiet night, despite being next to roads with traffic.

title: (7005) - CM1089
description: Parking next to the cemetery. We wanted to get away from noise and street lights. Good night calm. With the only sounds of crickets and wind in the palm trees

title: (7580) Albufeira - Unnamed Road
description: You have a parking with several camper when returning to this car park take the small path on your left between the olive trees and continue until the end or you will have a great location for small beach barbecue. Access only by truck or van I think it's complicated camping cam. (restaurant at 500m walk)

title: (7090-041) Alcáçovas - 18 Rua João A. Branco Paiva
title_short: (7090-041) Alcáçovas - 18 Rua João A. Branco Paiva
description: At the end of a parking lot, supply and disposal.

title: (7005-345) Évora - 4 Rua Luís Adelino Fonseca
description: Washing machines. 4eur/8kg. Dryer 2eur/18kg

title: (7090) Alcáçovas - Rua Cabeços Manoel
description: Quiet space behind the pools Lightly inclined

title: (7580) Santa Susana -
description: A very quiet place surrounded by nature and near the lake. We spent one night there and it was just what we needed. Hope it will be useful for anyone else.

title: (7090-064) Alcáçovas - 40 Rua da Bela Vista
description:
Free street parking above the beautiful municipal pool.
Lovely view. Very friendly town. visit the cow bell factory next to the cemetary.

title: () Albufeira - Barragem Pêgo do Altar
description: Nice place. Very quiet, with a restaurant nearby. There is also a sanitary building with toilet and shower free of charge. Mobile network very limited.

title: (7580) Santa Susana - Unnamed Road
description: Public shower with toilet

title: (7580) Alcácer do Sal - Unnamed Road
description: 1st Park4night spot armored camping because we crossed the dam and we found this place! Passage 10T ok, quiet.

title: (7005) Évora - IP2
description: We parked in the shade in front of the Pina restaurant, a good place to rest for a while. We had lunch in the shade of the tree, drank the coffee in the restaurant, and then took a nap.

title: (2965) - E90
description: Gas station service area with toilets, showers, water intake, picnic area, children's area and cafeteria. Suitable for a short stop and fill the tank with clean water

title: (7080) Vendas Novas - A6
description: Rest area at Repsol station. Indicated its use as a parking lot for caravans. Toilets and sinks available, picnic tables as well. We slept there, feeling safe next to the gas station and 24 hour cafeteria. NOTICE: The maximum stay on Portuguese motorways is 12 hours. By sleeping in the area, we exceeded this limit and had to pay for the journey from Lisbon to the border. It's not the domain's fault, and therefore for me 5*

title: (7490) Pavia - 47 Rua de Santo António
description: Ideal for a meal stop there is everything you need garbage water and something to entertain the children the toilets are a little higher on the right looking at the area

title: (2985) Pegões - Rua António Luís Fidalgo
description:
Quinta Dalhia welcomes you.
25 minutes from Lisbon and the sea.
Approaching National 4.
In large private house with large wooded park, swimming pool and bathroom available.
Rent pitches for camping car 3 or 4 max.
most: welcome and sympathy.

Possibility laundry with supplement.
contact Jacques by phone
address Quinta Dalhia
street Antonio Luis fidalgo
alfonso
2985 -000 Pegeos

title: (7490) Pavia - N251
description: Portugal, Évora district, Alentejo region, somewhere between Mora and Pavia. We could not just pass the signpost to the dolmen of 'Cromeleque das Fontainhas'. The first pictures show why our decision was made quickly, this will be our bedroom for tonight. No service.

title: (7490) Pavia - 21 Rua de Aviz
description: Pavia viewpoint (= “Miradouro”) with 2 picnic tables aside impressive very olive tree; and others around. I arrived with 7,5m motorhome but transit inside streets can recommend shorter vehicles.

title: (7490) Pavia -
description: Beautiful spot by the river, just off the main road. Spot for fishing. You can hear the road but it’s not too busy.

title: (7490-225) Mora - 6 Rua da Estação
description: The museum car park was the only straight car park I found in Mora. There is a small parking lane parallel to the road just in front of the entrance of the museum (that's where I parked) and about 15-20 parking spaces across the road, which can be used with a not too long van. Since the campsite I drove to was closed, I also parked here. No problems and quiet (until the neighbor's rooster started crowing). There is a café on the right at the end of the museum, waste bins and a small park behind the museum.

title: (2985) Pegões - 388 N4
description: Free parking. Bar next to the parking. Good for 1 night. Tip the security guard or buy a beer. Relatively quiet. Lorry and camper van parking.

title: (7490) Mora - Rua do Barco
description: River beach of Mora, fishing possible, swimming in summer, picnic table, barbecue. Quiet, calm by the river. To avoid in rainy weather because not tarred. Accessible to all sizes of motorhome.

name: ESA (Estação de Serviço Autocaravanas)
title: (7490) ESA (Estação de Serviço Autocaravanas)
description: ESA (Estação de Serviço Autocaravanas). Close to the Mora fluviario. Small campsite with all amenities and service area for motorhomes.

title: (7580-000) Alcácer do Sal -
description: Simple rest station, picknik area, water and air pressure station, water flow is slow, ok for washing your windows.. shop is in construction (JULY 2022)

title: (7490) - Unnamed Road
description: Easy access place for motorhome, with the beautiful river where you can bath. There are some picnic areas and a grill. It was very quiet to sleep as there is little traffic

title: (7490) Cabeção -
description: Nice plateau for motorhomes separated from the campsite with the possibility of emptying and filling up with water. Very friendly caretaker, speaks a little French but very good in English. Very calm place.

title: (7490) Pavia - 78 Rua 25 de Abril
description: A place surrounded by nature on the banks of a very pleasant and easily accessible river. On the other side of the shore you can see bulls. It is a fishing spot but there is none today. possibility to go further on the way.

name: Quinta Centro Lusitano Portugal
title: (2100) Quinta Centro Lusitano Portugal
description:
Nice place in the middle off nature. 
The owner is a host of workaway.info.
so you can park here in exchange for your farm help!
Phone number available to Pro subscribers
we do not provide any electricity and water...
u only work for a place where u can stand.

title: (7490) Cabeção - Unnamed Road
description: Flat land in the forest on a paved road, a little deformed by tree roots but widely practicable by all types of vehicles. This path stops at the level of a house that seems abandoned or perhaps a second home ... Very quiet, I was able to fall asleep with songs of locusts and / or cicadas in the distance. In the middle of the night, an animal came to pay me a visit around surely a hare; which woke me up but nothing bad. Thanks to this little stealthy alarm clock, I could hear an owl or an owl that was flying in the distance. And in the morning, it was very nice to wake up with different bird songs .. I highly recommend !!!

title: (7490) Cabeção - Unnamed Road
description: Cool place, near a road. Super quite. Great place to see the sunrise and sunset

title: (2100) Coruche - Caminho do Monte do Açude
title_short: (2100) Coruche - Caminho do Monte do Açude
description: Beautiful place

title: (7090) Aguiar - Unnamed Road
description: Full nature tourist hunting area, beware of the low chassis, dirt track but drivable without having a 4 × 4, village not far, calm assured. Very wide area, even at the start of the path, to stall. We continued a little farther for isolation if not at the roundabout on the right of the track a seemingly abandoned tennis court. Good morning, we had the visit of the shepherd. Very nice but told us that here is the cow park. We could park but before the barrier (opened last night). If not a very very quiet night.

name: Camping Bubulcus & Bolotas
title: (7040-700) Camping Bubulcus & Bolotas
description: Nature camping area. Completely sustainable. Electricity available (CEE), but high consumption equipment is NOT allowed as it is all off grid. Reservation is recommended.

title: (7580) - 30 Largo da Aldeia
description: Quiet place in pretty little village to spend the night. No service.

title: (7580) Largo da Aldeia - 325 Largo da Aldeia
title_short: (7580) Largo da Aldeia - 325 Largo da Aldeia
description: Easy accessible water tap in a small village. Wide roads and plenty of parking space. You can park close. We filled canisters super quickly.

title: (7580) Herdade da Palma - 35 Rua das Oficinas
title_short: (7580) Herdade da Palma - 35 Rua das Oficinas
description: A series of parking bays in the middle of the village surrounded by fields of chickens, storks and a hysterical little dog in the distance. Funny and relaxing village soundscape.

title: (2100) Couço - 36 Rua do Comercio
description: Charming circular parking lot near N4 and very close to the village of Courço. Two free water terminals picnic tables and play area for children. Garbage cans in the tuff car park opposite. Very peaceful night!

title: (2965-671) Marateca - N10
description: Gas station with water fill. Toilets but you need a key from the men in gas station

title: (2965) - N10
description: Public Toilets

title: (2100) Couço - Ponte de Santa Justa
description: Good place for the night and the rest, at the edge of the river and the garden.

title: (7595) Torrão - N2
description: Small corner for picnic. Does not know if possible to stay the night. But I think so.

title: (7595) Torrão - N2
description: Pleasant place to spend the night. Near the village, earth access but in good condition, on the edge of an old quarry and near the river.

title: (7040-612) Vimieiro - 7 Rua da Fonte
description: Picnic area, with tables, parking and shade

title: (7090-231) Viana do Alentejo - Estrada Dona Ana 1
title_short: (7090-231) Viana do Alentejo - Estrada Dona Ana 1
description: Services area on parking of the Municipal Park and the sports complex. Parking possible. Calm. Pool nearby. Nice village to visit with a castle.

title: () Torrão -
description:
This is a Quinta directly at the lake owned by a family. Warm shower, toilets and a chill area directly at the lake. Enjoy pure nature and observe the wildlife around the lake.
You can come with your caravan or tent. €12.- per van/tent. €3 per extra person/pet.
Contact them before you arrive and make sure they are around.

title: (7580) Alcácer do Sal - 1296 N120

Same as next to the information desk, public toilets and access to the village, which is really nice and original and well worth a visit. Stuck on the road and so noisy, and surrounded by thousands of mosquitoes. ID provided with repellent!

title: (7580) Alcácer do Sal - 1296 N120
description: Free parking! Great location. You are right on the river (not for swimming). Clean restroom on site. Large playground right next door. You can walk to a castle (uphill). There are restaurants, pharmacies, shops etc. nearby. The city is nicely lit up in the evenings.

name: Pacha Mama Community
title: (7580-305) Pacha Mama Community
description:
We are the PachaMama community and we would love to welcome you to our cozy little farm. 
We have everything you need including toilets, hot showers, wifi, chill-out zone with games, and a fully equipped kitchen. 

On Saturdays, we host an all-you-can-eat Pizza Party and you are very welcome to join!


There are a lot of animals and dogs on the farm and you are welcome to bring your own pet. 
We have a canal that runs through our 
property where you can cool off in the fresh water in the summer time. We also have a yoga dome with daily yoga classes.

There are two ways to reach us; either from the main road, or the other road crossing the small village of Bairro da 
Quintinha. NEVER take the road that crosses the village, it is very sandy and there is a great risk of getting stuck! Instead, turn right off the main road just before IC1. 

We look forward to welcoming you! :))

title: (2965) Marateca - 33 Rua Herois do Ultramar
description: The place is in the middle of town, it is a large area, relatively quiet and with little traffic. Just a faint noise from the nearby main road. There is gymnastics equipment and a playground. No shaded parking but shaded seating. Garbage disposal available. The entire parking lot is illuminated, so it is very bright in the evenings.

title: (2100) Coruche - 5 N251
description: Parking in the village church, noisy day and night, no fence height, far from the center, rather quiet, we spent the night with no problem with trash and drinking fountain beside

title_short: (7920-351) Vila Nova da Baronia - 7 Avenida 1º de Maio

parking lot.

title: () Coruche - Coruche
description: Area for motorhomes with all amenities! Store next door! Large river and with picnic areas and games for children! Near a bullring.

title: (7580) Monte Novo - Unnamed Road
description: Parking in the center of a small village in the middle of a nature reserve. The few locals welcomed us warmly, no water available and playground for children. Change of scenery guaranteed! Surprising location, we recommend this little detour in the middle of cork farms.

title: (2985) Canha - N10
description: An abandoned village. If you enjoy roaming lost places this is a good spot to have a stopover for some lunch or just to roam the old residential quarter including a church.

name: Área Serviço Autocaravanas da Erra
title: (2100) Área Serviço Autocaravanas da Erra
description: Installation specially designed for motorhomes. Part of an outdoor "pay" parking network. Check the website on the information board at the entrance. Google will probably take you down a dirt road with a narrow bridge. Suggest finding an alternate route if you have a large vehicle. On the edge of a quiet village.

title: (7425) Montargil -
description: With view for montargil dam, quiet and peaceful. Near the water. Don't sleep here because it's part of Natura 2000.

title: (4970-500) Torrão -
description: Nice and quiet place right behind the damm. No services at all but flat and with shade. Way to the water is steep but possible. You can walk with your dog for hours without meeting anyone.

title: (7425) Montargil - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful corner isolated from the world here at Montargil dam. Silence, lake to swim, eagles flying around, great bird watching and the best part no one around. If you come here be respectful and don’t make fires or trash the place.Bumpy road with sharp turns must be hard if wet but we came in summer so it was dry. A big fig tree close by if you are lucky to be here on the right season for it.

title: (7480) - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place at the reservoir very quiet.

title: (7940) Vila Alva - Unnamed Road

title: (7940) Vila Alva - Unnamed Road

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description:
Praia Fluvial do Pintadinho. Just ov
er the lake outside Orbitur permisses. Stayed a night and great for morning dive, but also during holidays on a Monday. Enjoy!

title: (7480) Alcôrrego -
description: Quiet place surrounded by nature to spend the day and night. The land is slightly sloping and access is dirt, but we managed with a 7 meter long motorhome. There were other people parking next to us, but the night was quiet.

name: Parque de Campismo Orbitur Montargil
title: () Parque de Campismo Orbitur Montargil
description: 4 km north of the village of Montargil, this Orbitur Group campsite is located on the banks of a huge artificial lake. Pleasant and well equipped certainly, but without soul. Lots of chalets, mobile homes and rather young locals who get together on weekends to play the guitar and party with a beer in hand! Swimming pool, bar / snacks, convenience store, excellent wifi connection in the area reserved for motorhomes and TV reception without problem. Quality sanitary facilities and very well maintained.

title: (7900) Odivelas - N257
description: Peaceful place with an unobstructed view of the wild lake. In this place, you feel like you're alone in the world

title: (7425) Montargil -
description: Optimal place to park in nature

title: (7425) Montargil -
description: Amazing view. Hard access. only 4x4 vehicles.

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Perfect place to spend an afternoon. We have been alone all day. It seems like a quiet place to spend the night. Narrow track access, better with a van.

title: (7900) Odivelas - Unnamed Road
description: Square in the countryside next to the dam. Near a charming Alentejo village. Nice view, very quiet place. Swimming possible. No convenience. Be careful not to drive into the sand. Bar Snack 800 meters to have a drink!

title: (7920) Alvito - Unnamed Road
description: Located on the at the ‘barragem de olivedas’ lake, between the picnic spot (with a very nice bar/restaurant) and the camping. The picnic spot (5 min walk) has toilets & showers and drinking water. Picnic spot itself gets checked by GNR quite regularly but camping a bit further out/behind it, leaves you a beautiful spot next to the lake with services close by.

title: () Odivelas - Unnamed Road
description: At the edge of the dam, site with bar snack, beach, children playground, outdoor barbecues, picnic, beach NET tables free volleyball, wc and showers.  Possibility to spend the night in the driveway above the site, but not inside the site because camping 1 km, peaceful place with amenities.

name: Camping Markadia
title: (7920-999) Camping Markadia
description: Campsite Markádia. The campsite is open all year round. It is located at the Odivelas reservoir, on a 25 acre peninsula. Best campsite we have been, huge lake to do activities: windsurf, Paddel, canoe, tenis, absolut Nature. Perfect layover between Algarve and Lisbon, it's a piece of heaven on earth. Everything very clean, Washrooms... 2 Restaurants with view to the lake. Pool, tenis, kids area.

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Breathtaking, breathtaking, magnificent views over the lake. Complete silence with nature all around. Great place to watch the stars and sunrise, RVs are forbidden

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Easy access, great shades and awesome view. Perfect for small campervans. In front of the water.

title: (7425) Montargil -
description: Beautiful place near the lake. Peaceful and calm

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Near a large artificial lake, many spots to settle.  The least: many rubbish and toilet paper, testify a lot of squatte. More road next but not so much noise. Most: very charming setting, swimming and fishing possible, shade and many places to put the vehicle. Maybe a bit more difficult to access, in some places, for big motorhomes.

title: (7900-360) Odivelas - 5 N2
description: Just a place to spend the night of you need a free spot around here. It's next to a hotel, it's safe and not alot of noise.

title: (7425) Montargil - N2
description: Very nice quiet spot.Ideal for small vans.At the morning some local fishermans.Very nice place for Sunrise.
